title: Fergie and Josh Duhamel Celebrate 8 Years of Marriage With New Family Photos
text:
Fergie and Josh Duhamel Anniversary Instagram Photos 2017 Fergie and Josh Duhamel Celebrate 8 Years of Marriage With New Family Photos January 11, 2017 Share This Link Copy What‚Äôs Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don‚Äôt forget to share this with your friends! ‚Üê Use Arrows Keys ‚Üí 1 Fergie and Josh Duhamel Celebrate 8 Years of Marriage With New Family Photos 
Fergie and Josh Duhamel celebrated a special milestone on Jan. 10: their 8th wedding anniversary. In honor of the occasion, both stars shared cute Instagrams on Tuesday. Fergie kicked things off by posting a shot of her and Josh at sea , writing, "Happy 8th anniversary to my bae üíãüíã." Josh quickly followed suit and expressed similar sentiments by uploading two snaps featuring their 3-year-old son, Axl , at the beach. While the photos may not have been as sizzling as their recent Hawaiian vacation , they certainly are adorable. Related:
